meaningMnemonic: An <radical>axe</radical> is sticking in the <radical>ground</radical> on top of a <radical>mountain</radical>. It's sticking into the very <kanji>peak</kanji>. Because why would you bother to stick your axe anywhere else on the mountain to prove you climbed it?
readingMnemonic: You can't help but <reading>gawk</reading> (がく) at the <kanji>peak</kanji>. Somehow it looks even higher now.
